body.name: ELSE NUTRITION Toddler Balanced Nutrition Drink 12 mo+, Dairy Free, Soy Free, Added Omega 3 & 6, Plant Based Formula, Clean Label Certified Powder Low Fodmap, 22 Oz 1 Pack
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 14 hrs 8 mins
features: CERTIFIED GOODNESS: Else Nutrition Toddler Omega is certified with the following certifications – Clean Label Purity Award, Plant Based, Beyond Soy, and Low Fodmap.

A REAL ALTERNATIVE TO COW’S MILK WITH CLEAN NUTRITION: This is a real choice besides dairy. Made with >80% minimally processed, whole food ingredients: buckwheat, almond and tapioca. Produced with the cleanest process we can use with no alteration to the ingredient’s chemical structure for a more natural digestion.

WITH ESSENTIAL OMEGA 3 & 6, Else Toddler Omega is a complete and balanced nutritional drink designed to support your little one’s growth and development, as well as promote natural digestion, through the combination of healthy unsaturated fats, fibers, and protein.

NUTRITIONALLY BALANCED: Else Nutrition Toddler Omega contains plant protein originating from almonds and buckwheat supplemented with additional free amino acids and a diverse fat profile derived from almond butter, coconut oil, and rapeseed oil, and sunflower oil. It is fortified with over 20 essential vitamins and minerals to support healthy growth & development.

TRY ELSE RISK-FREE TODAY: Else's mission is to reimagine kids’ nutrition, with plant-based complete nutrition products who taste good yet with ~50% less sugar than other leading brands. Backed by a 100% Satisfaction Guarantee! (Satisfaction guarantees may be rejected by Amazon)
DOES NOT CONTAIN RED DYE #3 - California recently banned the artificial color Red Dye #3 already banned in the EU due to its link to thyroid cancer.

Certified by the Clean Label Project's Purity Award, our products are rigorously and independently tested for over 400 contaminants and toxins, including heavy metals, pesticides, and industrial contaminants, ensuring unmatched purity and quality for your peace of mind.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Made with Whole Plants Made with >80% minimally processed, whole-food ingredients like Buckwheat, Almond, and Tapioca. Our unique formulation and process means no alteration to the ingredients chemical structure, keeping these plants natural for a more natural digestion. Omega 3 and Omega 6 for brain development Else Toddler Omega contains a complete, high-quality plant protein originating from buckwheat and almonds. Rich in essential omega 3&6 fatty acids and free from dairy, it's a carefully crafted choice for your toddler's daily nutrition. Clean Label Else Toddler Omega was awarded the Clean Label Project Purity Award, which tests products for over 400 impurities like BPA and others. That’s because we use the cleanest ingredients and process available to ensure this highest level of purity.
Every serving of Else Toddler Omega contains:

Toddler Omega Plant-Based Complete & Balanced Nutrition Plant-Based Complete Nutrition for Toddlers Plant Protein Nutritional Shake for Kids - Vanilla Flavor Plant Protein Nutritional Shake for Kids - Chocolate Flavor Age Range 12 to 36 months 12 to 36 months 2 to 12 years 2 to 12 years Dairy-free & Soy-free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Whole food, plant-based ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Allergens Almonds Almonds Almonds Almonds Added Omega 3 & 6 for braind development ✓ Organic ✓ ✓ ✓ Clean label certified - safe from heavy metals ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Vitamins and Minerals 24 24 20 20 Healthy Fats ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Gluten Free, non-GMO, no corn syrup ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dairy-free nutrition, yummy suppliment
reviews.reviewText: Best dairy-free, gluten-free product that I found. I bought this for my 93 yr old mom, because she can't have any dairy produts. She lost too much weight due to lack of appetite. She loves it and will drink it mixed in warm water. Without this extra protein, her ancles would swell up. Now, I know she's getting all the amino acids she needs and some extra calories to give her more energy. I really like the taste too. Makes more nutritious pancakes and cookies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The formula I usually use has been sold out so i tried this brand and i love that it comes with way more for the price then my other cans doesn’t devolve as well but i figured it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my picky eater Autistic toddler
reviews.reviewText: **Update** My son had the entire can and gets excited when he sees it and calls it his “milk” haha to clarify hes 3 yrs old and I can’t be thankful enough that this exists. My husband is happy knowing he’s at least getting supplemented as he doesn’t eat much not even candy to make him take vitamins.————————————————-This product gives me peace of mind that my son is getting the nutrients he needs alongside some protein. He has yet to try any meat and was seriously lacking in protein.He has serious food aversions that literally makes him scream, tremble, and gag, not to mention bad constipation and this formula helps aid in his digestion.He still eats only puréed foods w oatmeal or mashed potatoes with a couple snacks here and there. I have hope one day he will eat more but this formula is God send for us!The taste is actually quite good! I do add a tsp or less of sugar for his liking. It smells like chocolate milk to me but tastes closely to soy milk but it has no soy! Haha10/10 would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Toddler won't drink it
reviews.reviewText: Spent $30 on something my kid won't touch....She's 14 months and in the process of weaning. We've been giving her Silk Next Milk or So Delicious Wondermilk, which she drinks just fine, but I wanted to give her some toddler formula once or twice a day because it's more nutritious and filling.I've tried introducing it to her once or twice a day every day for almost a week now. I've tried using water or milk or a combo of both. I've tried cutting the amount of formula mixed in by half. Nothing works. She'll take one sip and then nothing until I give her the regular milk or breast milk again.I like the ingredients and that's it's plant based and organic and all that, but if my toddler won't drink it, none of that really matters, does it? Unfortunately wasted my money here. Maybe the company could improve the taste to make it more acceptable to kids. I've tried tasting it too and it's not very good. Has a weird aftertaste

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Our baby who has Cow Milk Protein Intolerance as well as issues with Soy Loves it!
reviews.reviewText: This product is amazing. Smells good, looks good, tastes great. Our baby loves it and it seems much easier on them than regular amino acid formulas. Our baby loves drinking this stuff, whereas with other options they just tolerate and eat it. Also they digest it more quickly so they eat more meals per day with this compared to amino acid formula. Lastly no spit up or vomit so far. Mind blown. Thank you ELSE ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Used to be our go to but now we suspect a bad batch
reviews.reviewText: My toddler has been using this for over a year. We just received our monthly subscription and every time he drinks it, he throws up. We’ve done some tests and it seems like our son only throws up shortly after drinking this. I’m now hesitant to order another one and may be cancelling our subscription. This was the only thing that got my son to wean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Our son loved Else on the very first try. We shake it up in a como tomo 8oz bottle with no issue mixing. We love the clean, vegan ingredients and omega-3.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best, most nutritious, formula
reviews.reviewText: My little one loves this, she is so healthy and taste is great! No animal ingredients either…
